HotelElement.Name: Residence Inn by Marriott Anaheim Maingate

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Residence Inn by Marriott Anaheim Maingate in Anaheim (Disneyland - Anaheim), you'll be minutes from Anaheim GardenWalk and close to Disney California Adventure® Park. This aparthotel is within close proximity of American Sports Center and Anaheim Indoor Marketplace.

Rooms
Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 200 individually furnished guestrooms, featuring fireplaces and flat-screen televisions. Kitchens are outfitted with refrigerators, stovetops, and microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This aparthotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, a fireplace in the lobby, and a television in the lobby. Spending a day of fun is easy with the theme park shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite from a grocery/convenience store serving guests of Residence Inn by Marriott Anaheim Maingate.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and a computer station. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite from a grocery/convenience store serving guests of Residence Inn by Marriott Anaheim Maingate.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
